page.title: 18BUCKLAND NEWTON JOBS
page.content: Of the{38 people}we interviewed 8 were retired,10 were farmers,5 were builders,2 were cleaners and there were 1 each of the following; O.A.P. warden,office worker, gardener,play group superviser,food packer,nurse, secretary,naval officer, student, barmaid,clerk,a firm's representative and The Chairman of the Agricultural Land Tribunal.Most people work in B.N. and the surrounding villages.4 work in Yeovil, 2 work in Dorchester,2 work in Blandford, and 1 each in Sturminster Newton, Plymouth, and the whole of the South West of England.The most popular means of transport is by car or van.9 people walk to work,one uses a bicycle and one is transported by helicopter. No one uses the bus service.Local jobs are connected with farming.The majority of these people walk to work.
